responses: Please contact customer support with your subscription needs (920) 634-2227 ex 8100
Machine is at full throttle. Make sure throttle is set at idle. Wait for Lidars to boot, set full throttle and resume

Make sure robot power button is off and the Wired E-Stop is released. PTO switch need to be down. Machine engine should turn over
Make sure nobody in on the seat and make sure the brake button is not illuminated
Make sure no one is using the machine
Make sure Lap bars are on down position. If a lot of dust exists in the mowing area, please see Operator's Manual
Yes, you can run your mower at night
Yes, you can store your machine on a trailer overnight
